column1: Calling hours will be on Tuesday June23
column2: 2015 from 6-8 pm with American Legion services at 7PM on Tuesday at the Shorts Spicer Crislip Funeral Homes Streetsboro Chapel.  Funeral services  will be 11:00 AM Wednesday  June 24
column3: 2015 at the funeral home with Minister Ralph Price officiating.  Burial with Military Honors will follow in Evergreen Cemetery Streetsboro
